title: Myrrh Chant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Chant about the healing properties of Myrrh at a player’s house. That player has a 50% chance to go and buy Myrrh instead of doing their night action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who’ve bought Myrrh may multitask using the Myrrh to heal themselves, granting them powerful defense for that night, but also consuming the Myrrh in the process
- Evil players are also roleblocked when using Myrrh. This may be affected by frames and disguises

desc:
Post 4862
_”Myrrh will heal all”_
_(How far can we take this?)_
